allow_origin_absent.description: A boolean value that skip cors response headers when origin header of request is empty

credentials.description: Flag to determine whether the `Access-Control-Allow-Credentials` header should be sent with `true` as the value.

exposed_headers.description: Value for the `Access-Control-Expose-Headers` header. If not specified, no custom headers are exposed.

max_age.description: Indicates how long the results of the preflight request can be cached, in `seconds`.

methods.description: 'Value for the `Access-Control-Allow-Methods` header. Available options include `GET`, `HEAD`, `PUT`, `PATCH`, `POST`, `DELETE`, `OPTIONS`, `TRACE`, `CONNECT`. By default, all options are allowed.'

origins.description: List of allowed domains for the `Access-Control-Allow-Origin` header. If you want to allow all origins, add `*` as a single value to this configuration field. The accepted values can either be flat strings or PCRE regexes.

preflight_continue.description: A boolean value that instructs the plugin to proxy the `OPTIONS` preflight request to the Upstream service.

private_network.description: Flag to determine whether the `Access-Control-Allow-Private-Network` header should be sent with `true` as the value.
